dialogue.message:
Welcome to Moonshot Inc. I'm Lincoln Rust the CEO
and owner. How was your journey in?

options.text:
I was attacked
by a swarm of bees.

dialogue.message:
Awesome. Would you like me to give you a quick rundown
of your new role here?

We need the code for our new rocket debugged before
the launch test on Friday: that's where you come in.

Our server is full of bugs and we need you to hit all
those bugs with a mallet. Smush em' good.

You'll work from the admin building. It's marked on
your map. Oh and make sure you only travel by map.

Some of our interns broke lose and overan the
grounds. Select a location on your map to travel there.

Feel free to explore and meet your new colleagues
just make sure you get that engine debugged by Friday!

Ah that reminds me, stay out of the containment area
in the R&D block. I don't want to replace another dev.
Who are you and what are you doing in my warehouse?

options.text:
I'm the new debugger,
I just came over to say hi.

dialogue.message:
I am Herbort Kowalczyk and I am the manager of this
department! I'll ask again, who are you?

options.text:
I'm new here, sorry.
Just taking a look around

I'm the new debugger,
I just came over to say hi.

dialogue.message:
My name is Hebort but everyone here calls me Bort. I am
 the manager of this department
Debugger comrade! Can I help you with anything?

This is the storage department, here we store essential
scomponents for rocket assembly.

You must be the new debugger. The bugs didn't escape
from this lab, that was just a rumor.

options.text:
Why do you have
bugs in here?

dialogue.message:
My name's Marjot by the way. I'm the lead researcher
working on samples returned from our space missions.

I have a colony of Isoptera, I love those little guys:
they're way more fun than an ant farm any day.

Lunar rocks, martian rocks, glowing rocks... you get
the idea. Oh, and the big guy next door in containment.

options.text: Sounds like a lot of rocks

dialogue.message:
Good luck with your debugging! I'd better get back to
work. Got a whole shipment of samples to process.

Oh hey you're that new dev! How's debugging going?
As you can see we're nearly ready for launch here.

My name Susan by the way. I'm the lead engineer
on Moonshot's latest generation of space craft.

Make sure you get that server debugged by Friday
it's a critical part of the new engine test.
Muh?

Hi! My name's Kyle but everyone around here calls me
the astro-nut because I really want to be an astronaut.

I'd love to chat but I'm busy waiting here in case they
need an astronaut.
